response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $10,000 for it. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the high demand and unique features of the product. I'm confident it will provide significant returns on your investment. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.", "product_price": 10000}
